title: Ragdoll_3.0
author: Ragdoll_3.0
content: Hello everyone!I am looking for a person from Nigeria (possibly someone with a bank account / bank card there) who will pay a small fee (around $12).Unfortunately, it is not possible to pay this fee from outside.I will pay $5 for help after the payment is credited, which is about $17 in BTC (or other crypto) in total.(If escrow is needed, I can accept any high ranked user of Bitcointalk)

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Is it possible for the escrow to verify whether or not the payment was made?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Ragdoll_3.0 on October 26, 2022, 09:41:58 AMHello everyone!I am looking for a person from Nigeria (possibly someone with a bank account / bank card there) who will pay a small fee (around $12).Unfortunately, it is not possible to pay this fee from outside.I would suggest you go to the local Nigeria thread. quite an active community, and there you will find several members with a good reputation here. you will surely find adequate answers to your requests.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5121680.0;topicseenAnd yes, using escrow is certainly a good condition for safe trade.

comments.author: Ragdoll_3.0
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on October 26, 2022, 09:47:14 AMIs it possible for the escrow to verify whether or not the payment was made?Yes, it is about payment for some publication. Without this fee publication will not show up. I can be fully transparent with person that will make that payment.I would suggest you go to the local Nigeria thread. quite an active community, and there you will find several members with a good reputation here. you will surely find adequate answers to your requests.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5121680.0;topicseenAnd yes, using escrow is certainly a good condition for safe trade.[/quote]Thank you! Will try there!

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Ragdoll_3.0 on October 26, 2022, 09:41:58 AMI am looking for a person from NigeriaUser CryptopreneurBrainboss fits your geological criteria. Feel free to contact him.PS: CryptopreneurBrainboss, I am not endorsing OP but thinking you might help him since you are from the same region.
